scripts.lint: eslint backend/ frontend/ && echo LINTING OK || (echo LINTING ERROR; false)
scripts.npmls: npm ls 2>&1 && echo NPMLS OK || echo NPMLS ERROR
scripts.sysinfo: uname -a && cat /proc/meminfo && df -h . && echo SYSINFO OK || echo SYSINFO ERROR
scripts.versions: echo -n 'NODE ' && node -v && echo -n 'NPM ' && npm -v && node -e 'console.log(process.versions);' && echo VERSIONS OK || echo VERSIONS ERROR
scripts.testcafe: testcafe chrome:headless tests/test.js && echo TESTCAFE OK || (echo TESTCAFE ERROR; false)
scripts.testcafe:gui: testcafe chrome tests/test.js && echo TESTCAFE:GUI OK || (echo TESTCAFE:GUI ERROR; false)
scripts.test:gui: npm run testcafe:gui && echo NPM TEST:GUI OK || (echo NPM TEST:GUI ERROR; false)
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm test && echo NPM TEST:ALL OK || (echo NPM TEST:ALL ERROR; false)
scripts.test: npm run testcafe && echo NPM TEST OK || (echo NPM TEST ERROR; false)
